Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products that pass the inspection process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: (Number of Units Passed Inspection / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The extent to which inspections are performed relative to the total number of items or batches.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: (Number of Units Inspected / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of defects identified during the inspection process.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: (Number of Defects Detected / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The average cost incurred for inspecting each unit.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: Total Inspection Cost / Total Units Inspected

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of corrective actions that are implemented as planned.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: (Number of Corrective Actions Implemented / Total Corrective Actions) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The average time taken to complete the inspection process from start to finish.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: Total Inspection Time / Number of Units Inspected

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products or processes that do not meet quality standards.
Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.FORMULA: (Number of Non-Conforming Units / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Quality Assurance+Inspecti.EXPLANATION: The percentage of inspections that correctly identify defects or issues.
